replies.body: I think Aatrox could use more in regards to his abilities rather than reducing some numbers on his passive. A touch up on his E perhaps? I don't know. Was a little underwhelmed that's all.

Why they updating TT if its not even a permanent game type along with crystal scar i know people play it in customs but it would be good if after the updates to the maps they make them permanent game types in pvp

ikr

I would love to see TT as a permanent queue.

TT is a permanent queue on other servers, hell, they have a permanent ranked queue for it too. 
Riot doesn't just focus on Oceania, we are a small percentage of their playerbase

Pretty much. It's better when it is on the weekends for them anyway, because having a server up 24/7 costs money. If they don't get a decent response then of course they are gonna cut back a bit to reduce expenses. I would actually rather see a Dominion queue on the weekends to be honest.
Why do I get the feeling {{champion:245}} nerfs are going to be as rare as{{champion:55}} and {{champion:92}}... on the plus side {{champion:34}} gets a new skin

cos he doesn't need them,
all his damage and cc is incredibly televised

He does need a bit of re-balancing. The stun he has does take a while to go off, I'm more concerned about his dash considering it counts as a basic attack (activates lich bane) then magic damage from being an ability (sets of ludens echo) and there goes half your health bar if not more. Also when he sets of w and is inside, the shield he gets is massive. In a match I had with one he had only a quarter health left. He used his w and got almost a full bars worth of a shield. He is interesting and fun to play with all his maneuverability and gap closers but yeah.. :)

Basically, the way he is now, Ekko gets a free kill at level 2. During level 1, even two hits from his Q will chunk you down to about a 1/3 depending on who you play, but most mid-laners are real squishy. Once you hit lvl2, grab Phase Dive, throw your Q, Phase Dive in, and when your passive procs it basically kills them. EZ, 2EZ

But at least they are looking at making his ult cost 100 mana rather than being free.

Thank you!! I saw that on Surrender and liked it. But yes, as you say, he can kill you at level 2 without much issue because of his burst. People try to defend him and his true damage by comparing him to Ahri but the thing is she doesn't do nearly as much damage as Ekko does.

Ekko is nothing like Ahri. Ahri is a regular Mage, while Ekko is a caster assassin. While Ahri has superior kiting abilities, Ekko is just slippery and dashes away. The only thing they have in common is that they deal magic damage.

People who try to defend the ridiculous amount of damage he deals are just weird. How can you justify dealing that much damage, while being able to heal, while being able to grab a 1k hp shield?

Prehistoric gnar???

Pls?
